alert.note: Alert for Pickens Mountains (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pickens County through 315 PM EDT... At 245 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles northwest of Pickens, or 4 miles southeast of Jocassee Gorges, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pickens, Liberty, Jocassee Gorges, Table Rock State Park, Sunset, Pumpkintown and Nine Times. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
